Message:
Then the day came,
and the Knights arrived.

The sight of them, looking
down from high atop their horses,

adorned in their glistening armor,
was simply overwhelming.
Not one of us could speak.
My excitement gave way to awe.

Finally, one of those knights
I had so long adored broke
the silence.

“We have word there
is a witch among you.”
And just like that, it all began.
